General.Name: CammSys Corp
General.Description: CammSys Corp. primarily manufactures and sells camera modules for smart phones in South Korea. It also offers automotive electronics-IT products, such as automotive cameras, around view monitoring systems, and advanced driver assistance systems; biometric security solutions, including H/W security solutions and ultrasonic fingerprint sensors; and electric vehicles. The company was formerly known as Cuzco LBE and changed its name to CammSys Corp. in March 2010. CammSys Corp. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
